Message.Title: Newz article readz:
Message.Msg: "A secure retirement a fading dream for growing numbers" Sybil couldnt have said it better. Saving money doesnt work and the worthless stok market filled with 401k, pensionz, and ira'z iz anything but 'secure'

Message.Title: True panichomo, a bounce to the fiddy day sma could be in the cardz - bots willing
Message.Msg: At which time and/or higher, sybil will sell more shorts. Sybil iz a long term sell, hold and add on the rips divestor of pig stox.

Message.Title: Actually panichomo, sybs seez no need for bots to dressup amzn in their 'portfolioz' for eoq
Message.Msg: The motivation / hype / action just aint there this quarter. Its at or very near the same price az it waz at the begining of the quarter which coincidez with YTD performance while the market itself iz double digit percentage points higher. On that note sybs seez the mojo haz exited stage right and would not be surprized to see a blistering drop outta nowhere in the cardz for this pig. For 10 yearz, particularly the last 5 of them, people have come to 'expect' the amzn bounce play ignoring ever deteriorating fundiez. Sybs would not be surprised to see this pig take a dump after its recent stealthy rollover... Piggy drops tend to happen outta nowhere.... Thats why sybil doesnt get into the short then cover then short then cover 2 step dance move. Sybs tradez very little. Now that being said, sybil haz some (very few) $245 coverez at the 200 sma in for a nice swing trade of some shorts taken north of 278 with planz to reopen them north of 265 on a swing bounce reshort play .... And big planz to add more short north of 278 if the opportunity presents its self wether or not sybs gets a crack at covering 245.... This stock iz an easy play for the patient short. Robots are truelly trapped where thier only way of making money iz writing optionz and murdering crackheadz, but the optionz just arent fetching the premiumz that they used to, and crackheadz are either already gone or getting a clue on the weekly gamez.

Message.Title: Exdon, sybs iz unable to reply w/o creating a new subject line
Message.Msg: That fact that you have covered expecting a typical 'bounce' that 'alwayz happenz' iz in sybs view a dangerous move at which the risk of haing to chase a lost opportunity of a big drop only to walk right into a bounce. If short or long a stock, sybil iz never 'all off' unless sybs iz prepared to leave it with no set planz of a return. Watch out homey - yourz iz themost common of thoughts in sybs view.

Message.Msg: Its name iz "ist_phase_...." This iz the part were shorting gets real easy. Just stay short and watch your cost basis shrink, and cash in many moonz from now and keep the difference. Shorting pig stox theze markets haz never been easier az bag holderz line themselvez up at the top of the hill like ducks in an arcade shooting gallery.
